name: Blind evoL
description:
This was for the 1 Week Brackey's Game Jam. The theme was rewind and I missed the submission window by 1 sec . :(  Very Sorry Team. The Rewind Mechanic doesn't really work well as I was under pressure and couldn't think of any better solutions.

It was a nightmare coding this but an amazing escape from these corona times. Thank you FAv and Doumaki. For listening to my vague requirements.

Solution to Puzzle

Animator and Character Designer - FAv https://twitter.com/FAV_Faris

Visual effects and game idea - Doumaki https://twitter.com/Doumaki8

Programming - Rosziv https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R43dYg_Kuc0

Music: https://youtu.be/hz8iuXaIav8

Most of the Sfx: https://freesound.org/
